es.ucm.fdi.lps.p3.testx
Class LocationTest

java.lang.Object
  es.ucm.fdi.lps.p3.testx.LocationTest

public class LocationTest
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains all the tests (proposed by the lecturer) for the Location class.
